gold.user: Admin user requesting all groups in the realm to manage user roles and permissions.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of groups in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user creating a new group for organizing users based on their roles.
gold.ideal: Creates a new group in the specified realm and returns the created group's details.

gold.user: Admin user checking the total number of groups in the realm for reporting purposes.
gold.ideal: Returns the count of groups in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific group to review its members and permissions.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the group with the specified ID.

gold.user: Admin user updating the group's name and description to reflect its current purpose.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified group's details and returns the updated group.

gold.user: Admin user deleting an obsolete group that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified group and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: Admin user adding a subgroup to an existing group for better organization.
gold.ideal: Adds a child group to the specified group and returns the updated group structure.

gold.user: Admin user checking the management permissions of a group to ensure proper access control.
gold.ideal: Returns the management permissions associated with the specified group.

gold.user: Admin user updating the management permissions of a group to enhance security.
gold.ideal: Updates the management permissions for the specified group and returns the updated permissions.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving the list of members in a group to manage user assignments.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of members belonging to the specified group.
